name: Green Park Boutique Hotel

reviews.text: Overall, I thought this was a nice place to stay in in Vientiane. It's not an international standard first class hotel, but then you are in Laos which has not yet caught up with the times (which is why the country is so charming).
reviews.title: Nice place!

likes.liked: — Friendly and helpful staff, nice architecture and pool

reviews.title: Good but not as great as the reviews suggest
reviews.text: The complex is attractive with a nice pool. Staff were very friendly and keen to help. There is free internet access.
Breakfast on the terrace of the restaurant was quite pleasant, although the breakfast food choices are nothing to write home about. We had a nice lunch too at the restaurant.
reviews.title: "Delight'-the-customer" standard of service

likes.disliked: — The trees are still new..once the they are leafier, the place will be even prettier

reviews.text: The room was nice and modern.
reviews.title: Outstanding service, beautiful place

reviews.text: During our stay, the hotel was really quiet with very few guests, it would have been nicer if there had been a bit more life around us.
reviews.title: Authentic Lao hospitality
Green Park Hotel - a Vientiene GEM
reviews.text: As each of our 4 children have completed primary school we have taken them to visit Asia. At Christmas 2005 with our youngest child we visited Thailand, Singapore (both countries we know well) and added in Laos. This turned out to be a delightful first. Thanks to a tripadvisor forum posted last October, I investigated Green Park Hotel, Vientiene; we'll be forever indebted to that member who'd found a new hotel that was about to open just aftey left Laos.

description: Green Park Boutique Hotel is capturing a Lao style orientation with a finest contemporary architecture of Laos. The elegance of the interiors, both historic and contemporary, and glorious settings are combined to create the most distinguished collection of stylish and luxury hotel in Vientiane.Green Park Boutique Hotel is perfectly located in the central business and embassy district, with a walking distance to Morning Marketing Shopping mall (Talat Sao Market) and tourist attractions. The hotel provides free of charge scheduled shuttle bus to city center as well as complimentary bicycles use to explore most of the city.
